CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(isManager__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.ManagerId)), IF(contains($Label.SanjitId,CASESAFEID(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Manager.ManagerId)), Manager_1__c, IF( contains($Label.ManagerId,CASESAFEID(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Manager.ManagerId)), Manager_1__c, SBQQ__SalesRep__r.Manager.ManagerId )), "" ), IF( contains( $Label.ManagerId,CASESAFEID(SBQQ__SalesRep__r.ManagerId)), Manager_1__c, SBQQ__SalesRep__r.ManagerId ) )
CustomField.label: Manager 2
